description:
These steel toe Blundstones have been up-armored for added durability and protection. The classic Blunny fit and comfort ensure you're happy on your feet, even after the workday is over.

  • 2.5mm leather upper is weatherproof, breathable and hardwearing
  • CSA Grade 1 protective steel toecap
  • Dual-density polyurethane midsole is supportive and puncture-resistant
  • Puncture resistant mid-sole layer by Lenzi: lighter, safer, more flexible, more comfortable and warmer than steel
  • TPU outsole resists oil, acid, electric shocks and provides excellent traction
  • Removable PORON® XRD™ impact absorpting footbed offers all-day comfort
  • Soles are injection-moulded, with no gluing or stitches
  • Sturdy pull tabs and waterproof elastic gore panels for easy on and off
  • Slip on design means there are no laces to snag or catch on the job
  • Burly heel and toe bumpers offer protection and let you remove them hands-free
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone Work  & Safety 180 Boots - Unisex
